text: Vony sposterihayut聞 vas ta chekayete; yakshcho vy dosyahayete peremohy z BOHA, yak kazhut聞 (do vas), my ne z vamy?" Ale yakshcho disbelievers otrymuyemo obih, yak kazhut聞 (yim), my ne storona z vamy, ta zakhystyla vas z viruyuchiv?" BOH bude pryymaty rishennya mizh vamy na Dni Resurrection. BOH nikoly ne dozvolyt聞 disbelievers shchob perevazhaty nad viruyuchamy
